description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Bondi Beach, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Sun-Kissed Bondi Self-Contained Stay near the Beach
hotels.description: Experience sun-kissed bliss with a self-contained stay at the stylish Adina Apartment Hotel Bondi Beach Sydney, superbly located within easy walking distance of the famed sandy stretch. This unique 'aparthotel' is teeming with classic yet contemporary features sure to impress, and each studio boasts its own balcony and kitchenette, and apartments a fully-equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Unique design elements including contemporary furnishings such as detailed cornices and marble finishes are complemented by modern technology. Across the property, discover tasteful facilities including a gymnasium, outdoor swimming pool and convenient onsite parking.

seo.title: Hotel a Bondi Beach - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Bondi Beach, Australia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
